page.title: 09LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: The population of Gilmerton consists of an even spread of age groups but the majority of those interviewed were retired people or young mothers who were generally the only ones at home. The main leisure time activity is gardening as every house has a garden in this rural area. As the golf course borders the village this is another activity much partaken in. There is a youth club in the village for the teenagers and a small play area situated at the back of the housing estate for the younger childern. Other hobbies included photography, embroidery, dress making and knitting.
